entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this afternoon with 30 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Risk of thunderstorms over western sections late this afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 22. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 12:31 PM PDT Monday 16 May 2016

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers this evening. Risk of thunderstorms over western sections early this evening then partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 12:31 PM PDT Monday 16 May 2016
